languages.text: "Когда я только вступила в твой мир, мир неги и роскоши, меня спутывали обеты, наставления..." {n}Кибелла движется с особой, хищной грацией.{/n} "Все, что есть удел ткачей Кровавой паутины. Понадобилось время, чтобы понять: эти оковы не для меня. Они для тех, кто боится таких, как мы. Боится тех, кто выше. Сильнее. Я — не ровня этим ничтожествам".

traits.locale_text: "Когда я только вступила в твой мир, мир неги и роскоши, меня спутывали обеты, наставления, правила..." {n}Кибелла движется с особой, поистине хищной грацией.{/n} "Всем тем, что есть удел простых членов Кровавой паутины. Мне понадобилось время, чтобы понять, что эти оковы созданы не для меня. Они созданы для тех, кто боится таких, как мы. Боится тех, кто выше. Сильнее. Достойнее большего".

languages.text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."
languages.original_text: "Когда я только вступила в твой мир, мир неги и роскоши, меня спутывали обеты, наставления..." {n}Кибелла движется с особой, хищной грацией.{/n} "Все, что есть удел ткачей Кровавой паутины. Понадобилось время, чтобы понять: эти оковы не для меня. Они для тех, кто боится таких, как мы. Боится тех, кто выше. Сильнее. Я — не ровня этим ничтожествам".

traits.locale_text: "When I stepped into your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She treads forward with the grace of a prowling predator.{/n} "Everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. It took time to realise that those bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us. People who stand above them. Who are stronger than them. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

languages.text: «Cuando entré en tu mundo por primera vez, un mundo de felicidad y lujo, aún estaba encadenada por mis juramentos y enseñanzas...». {n}Da un paso adelante con la elegancia de un depredador al acecho.{/n} «Por todo lo que representa la Red Sanguinolenta. Necesitaba tiempo para entender que esas cadenas no eran para mí. Son para la gente que teme a los que son como nosotros: superiores a ellos, más fuertes que ellos. No permitiré que se me compare con esas criaturas miserables».
languages.original_text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando entré en tu mundo por primera vez, un mundo de felicidad y lujo, aún estaba encadenada por mis juramentos y enseñanzas...». {n}Da un paso adelante con la elegancia de un depredador al acecho.{/n} «Por todo lo que representa la Red Sanguinolenta. Necesitaba tiempo para entender que esas cadenas no eran para mí. Son para la gente que teme a los que son como nosotros: superiores a ellos, más fuertes que ellos. No permitiré que se me compare con esas criaturas miserables».

languages.text: 「至福と豪奢の世界であるあなたの世界に足を踏み入れた時、私はまだ、近いと教えに縛られていたわ…」{n}彼女は獲物をつけ狙う捕食者のように、優雅に足を踏み出す。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが内包するあらゆるもので。そんな絆は私のためのものではないと気づくには時間が必要だった。それは私たちのような人間を…自分たちの上に立ち、自分たちよりも強い人間を恐れる者たちのためのもの。私はそんなみじめな生き物と比べられるつもりはないの」
languages.original_text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

traits.locale_text: 「至福と豪奢の世界であるあなたの世界に足を踏み入れた時、私はまだ、近いと教えに縛られていたわ…」{n}彼女は獲物をつけ狙う捕食者のように、優雅に足を踏み出す。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが内包するあらゆるもので。そんな絆は私のためのものではないと気づくには時間が必要だった。それは私たちのような人間を…自分たちの上に立ち、自分たちよりも強い人間を恐れる者たちのためのもの。私はそんなみじめな生き物と比べられるつもりはないの」

languages.text: “当我踏入你的世界，来到那个幸福、奢华的世界时，我依然受到誓言与教义的束缚……”{n}她优雅地向前走着，仿佛掠食者在追踪猎物。{/n}“织血罗网所包罗的一切，都在束缚着我。我花了很长时间才意识到，这样的束缚并不适合我。它是为那些惧怕我们的人而准备的。我们站在那些人之上，我们比那些人更加强大，我不想和那群可怜虫相提并论。”
languages.original_text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

traits.locale_text: “当我踏入你的世界，来到那个幸福、奢华的世界时，我依然受到誓言与教义的束缚……”{n}她优雅地向前走着，仿佛掠食者在追踪猎物。{/n}“织血罗网所包罗的一切，都在束缚着我。我花了很长时间才意识到，这样的束缚并不适合我。它是为那些惧怕我们的人而准备的。我们站在那些人之上，我们比那些人更加强大，我不想和那群可怜虫相提并论。”

languages.text: "Als ich den Fuß in Eure Welt setzte, die voller Glückseligkeit und Luxus ist, war ich noch von Eiden und Lehren gebunden ..." {n}Sie tritt mit der Eleganz eines lauernden Raubtiers einen Schritt nach vorne.{/n} "Von allem, was das Blutgesponnene Netz umfasst. Ich brauchte Zeit, um zu erkennen, dass derlei Bande nichts für mich sind. Sie sind gedacht für jene, die Personen wie uns fürchten – Personen, die über ihnen stehen und stärker sind als sie. Ich lasse mich mit solch jämmerlichen Kreaturen nicht vergleichen."
languages.original_text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

traits.locale_text: "Als ich den Fuß in Eure Welt setzte, die voller Glückseligkeit und Luxus ist, war ich noch von Eiden und Lehren gebunden ..." {n}Sie tritt mit der Eleganz eines lauernden Raubtiers einen Schritt nach vorne.{/n} "Von allem, was das Blutgesponnene Netz umfasst. Ich brauchte Zeit, um zu erkennen, dass derlei Bande nichts für mich sind. Sie sind gedacht für jene, die Personen wie uns fürchten – Personen, die über ihnen stehen und stärker sind als sie. Ich lasse mich mit solch jämmerlichen Kreaturen nicht vergleichen."

languages.text: « Quand j'ai mis les pieds dans votre monde, un monde de luxe et de volupté, j'étais encore liée par mes serments et enseignements... » {n}Elle avance d'un pas avec la grâce d'un prédateur en chasse.{/n} « Par tous les principes fondateurs de la Toile de Sang. Il m'a fallu du temps pour comprendre que ces liens ne m'étaient pas destinés. Ils sont l'apanage de ceux qui craignent les gens comme nous, leurs supérieurs tant en force qu'en autorité. Je refuse qu'on me compare à ces créatures pitoyables. »
languages.original_text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

traits.locale_text: « Quand j'ai mis les pieds dans votre monde, un monde de luxe et de volupté, j'étais encore liée par mes serments et enseignements... » {n}Elle avance d'un pas avec la grâce d'un prédateur en chasse.{/n} « Par tous les principes fondateurs de la Toile de Sang. Il m'a fallu du temps pour comprendre que ces liens ne m'étaient pas destinés. Ils sont l'apanage de ceux qui craignent les gens comme nous, leurs supérieurs tant en force qu'en autorité. Je refuse qu'on me compare à ces créatures pitoyables. »

languages.original_text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."

languages.text: "Saadet ve lüksle dolu dünyana adım attığımda hâlâ antlara ve öğretilere bağlıydım..." {n}Avının peşindeki bir yırtıcının zarafetiyle adım atıyor.{/n} "Kanipi Ağı'nın içerdiği her şeye bağlıydım. Böylesine bağların bana göre olmadığını fark etmem için zamana ihtiyacım vardı. O bağlar, bizim gibi insanlardan... Kendilerinden üstün, kendilerinden daha kuvvetli olanlardan korkanlara göre. O zavallı yaratıklarla kıyaslanmayı reddediyorum."
languages.original_text: "When I set foot in your world, a world of bliss and luxury, I was still bound by oaths and teachings..." {n}She steps forward with the grace of a stalking predator.{/n} "By everything that the Bloodspun Web encapsulates. I needed time to realise that such bonds were not for me. They are meant for those who fear people like us — people who stand above them, who are stronger than they are. I will not be compared to those miserable creatures."
